column4: hello, Does anyone know how to boot ubuntu live cd from an external usb cdrom ?
it's not working for me, while I know I can boot from it since it did work with windows install cd

if your BIOS doesn't support that, i guess you just can't do it. but the page i gave you (the second one, the first was wrong) gives you other possible methods for booting the CD, like using a floppy disk or a USB key
